str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bridal chamber. From numphe; the bridal room.
To mourn, lament, feel guilt. From penthos; to grieve.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
A bridegroom. From numphe; a bride-groom.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To come, go.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bridegroom. From numphe; a bride-groom.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To take away, remove; pass: To be taken away, withdrawn. From apo and airo; to lift off, i.e. Remove.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To fast, abstain from food. From nestis; to abstain from food.
